text: @adamboultonSKY @BorisJohnson @DominicRaab I despise Johnson. But I read that he's not ill, and also that he is more ill than is being admitted. All of this is conjecture. Of all the scandal around Covid-19 in the UK, Johnson's absence and recovery isn't the story.
